CLEAR.DELETED: {count, plural, =0 {No messages were deleted} one {`#` message deleted} other {`#` messages deleted}}
CLEAR.DESCRIPTION: Deletes chat messages from up to 2 weeks ago
CLEAR.NAME: clear

COUNT.DESCRIPTION: The number of messages to delete
COUNT.NAME: count

DELETE_PINNED.DESCRIPTION: Whether to delete pinned messages (Default: False)
DELETE_PINNED.NAME: delete-pinned

COLOR.ALREADY_NO_ROLE: You already has no color role
COLOR.EDIT_ESTIMATED: Estimated color of your avatar, enter a valid color to edit again
COLOR.EDIT_INVALID: Invalid color, enter a new valid color
COLOR.EDITED_REPEAT: Edited color, enter a valid color to edit again
COLOR.MIX_INVALID: Invalid color, enter a valid color to mix
COLOR.MIXED_REPEAT: Mixed color, enter a color to mix again
COLOR.NO_ROLE: You don't have a color role
COLOR.SAME_USER_CAN_INTERACT: It is not necessary to mention yourself if you're going to change your own color
COLOR.TARGET_ALREADY_NO_ROLE: The mentioned user already has no color role
COLOR.TARGET_NO_ROLE: The mentioned user does not have a color role
COLOR.USER_CAN_INTERACT: {userName} can also interact with the system

ECHO.DESCRIPTION: Echoes a message through the bot (Requires: Manage messages if non-ephemeral)
ECHO.GO_TO: [Click here to go to the message]({msgURL})

INSUFFICIENT.ARGS: You need to provide a content or an option that enables the embed
INSUFFICIENT.PERMS: You need the `{perm}` permission to echo non-ephemeraly

ECHO.NAME: echo

AUTHOR.DESCRIPTION: Sets the author of the embed (Enables embed)
AUTHOR.NAME: author

CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: Echoes at a channel as a message (Default: Invoked channel as a reply)
CHANNEL.NAME: channel

COLOR.DESCRIPTION: The color of the embed (Default: Author's display color)
COLOR.NAME: color

CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: The content of the message (Required if embed is disabled)
CONTENT.NAME: content

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: The description of the embed (Enables embed)
DESCRIPTION.NAME: description

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: The footer of the embed (Enables embed)
FOOTER.NAME: footer

IMAGE.DESCRIPTION: The image of the embed (Enables embed)
IMAGE.NAME: image

THUMBNAIL.DESCRIPTION: The thumbnail of the embed (Enables embed)
THUMBNAIL.NAME: thumbnail

TIMESTAMP.DESCRIPTION: Enables or disabled the timestamp on the embed (Default: Disabled)
TIMESTAMP.NAME: timestamp

TITLE.DESCRIPTION: The title of the embed (Enables embed)
TITLE.NAME: title

TTS.DESCRIPTION: Echoes the message in TTS (Default: False)
TTS.NAME: tts

URL.DESCRIPTION: The title's URL of the embed
URL.NAME: url

EMOJI.DELETING_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this emoji?
EMOJI.NAME: emoji

INFO.DESCRIPTION: Shows info or manages an emoji
INFO.NAME: info

EMOJI.DESCRIPTION: ID, mention, unicode or name (if it's on the same server)
EMOJI.NAME: emoji

CREATED.CDN: Copied from an emoji found on the Discord CDN using the emoji system
CREATED.DELETED: Deleted emoji recreated using the emoji system
CREATED.UNICODE: Copied from an unicode emoji found on the twemoji CDN using the emoji system

ROLES.ADD: Enter a role to add it to the emoji
ROLES.ADDED_REPEAT: Role added to emoji, enter another role to add it
ROLES.REMOVE: Enter a role to remove it from the emoji
ROLES.REMOVED_ALREADY: This role is already not defined
ROLES.REMOVED_REPEAT: Role removed from emoji, enter another role to remove it

EMOJI.UNALLOWED_SERVER: You are not allowed to edit an emoji from another server

ERROR.CANNOT_SEND_CHANNEL_MESSAGES: Cannot send messages on specified channel
ERROR.DEVELOPERS_ONLY: This command can only be used by the bot developers
ERROR.DM: This command cannot be used in DMs

MAXIMUM.ANIMATED: The server is at the limit of `{limit, number}` animated emojis
MAXIMUM.STATIC: The server is at the limit of `{limit, number}` static emojis

MAXIMUM_NOW.ANIMATED: The server has now reached the limit of `{limit, number}` animated emojis
MAXIMUM_NOW.STATIC: The server has now reached the limit of `{limit, number}` static emojis

EMOJI.NONEXISTENT: You can't edit the emoji as it no longer exists

ERROR.EXECUTING_INTERACTION: An error occurred while executing this interaction

IMAGE.SIZE: The image size is bigger than `{maxSize, number}kb`
IMAGE.TYPE: The image type should be either `png`, `jpeg`, or `gif`

NAME.LONG: The input `{input}` {condition, select, longer{is longer than {maxLength, plural, one{**# character**} other{**# characters**}}} shorter{is shorter than {minLength, plural, one{**# character**} other{**# characters**}}} other{}}{alphanum, select, also{ and also contains **non-alphanumerical characters**} only{contains **non-alphanumerical characters**} other{}}

INVALID.TIME: The time `{input}` {condition, select, greater{is greater than **{time}**} less{is less than **{time}**} other{is not valid}}
INVALID.TIME_AUTOCOMPLETE: {condition, select, greater{(Greater than {time}) {input}} less{(Less than {time}) {input}} other{Invalid time}}

ERROR.RELOADING_APPLICATION_COMMAND: An error occured while reloading an application command

UNALLOWED.CHAT: You are not allowed to use this command in this chat
UNALLOWED.COMMAND: You are not allowed to interact with this command
UNALLOWED.DELETE_RESPONSE: You can only delete the responses from my commands you triggered

GENERIC.NAME: Name
GENERIC.WIP_COMMAND: This command is currently under development
GENERIC.WIP_FUNCTION: This function is currently under development

GUILD.DESCRIPTION: The guild the command is at (Default: Invoked guild)
GUILD.NAME: guild

ID.DESCRIPTION: ID of a specific command (Default: All commands)
ID.NAME: id

RESPAWN_DELAY.DESCRIPTION: Wait time between killing a shard's process and restarting it
RESPAWN_DELAY.NAME: respawn-delay

TIMEOUT.DESCRIPTION: Wait time for a shard to become ready before continuing to another
TIMEOUT.NAME: timeout

PERM.NO_LONGER: You no longer have the required `{perm}` permission
PERM.ROLE_REQUIRES: {role} requires the `{perm}` permission for the interaction to work properly
PERM.SEND_MESSAGES_IN_THREADS: Send Messages in Threads and Posts

REMINDER.DELETING_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
REMINDER.NAME: reminder

RECURSIVE.DISABLED: Can't set as recursive because the reminder time should be at least **{time}**

CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: The channel to create the rolemenu
CHANNEL.NAME: channel

ID.DESCRIPTION: The message id of the rolemenu in the channel
ID.NAME: id

ROLLOUT.DESCRIPTION: Shows information about experiments and their rollouts
ROLLOUT.NAME: rollout

EXPERIMENT.DESCRIPTION: The experiment to get its information
EXPERIMENT.NAME: experiment

GUILD.DESCRIPTION: A guild to get its experiments' information (Default: Invoked guild)
GUILD.NAME: guild

LANGUAGE.CURRENT_IS: The current language of the bot on this server is `{lang}`
LANGUAGE.NAME: English (United States)
LANGUAGE.NOT_SUPPORTED: The bot currently does not have support for `{input}`

LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: The language to set the bot to
LANGUAGE.NAME: language

LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Sets a new language (Requires: Manage guild)
LANGUAGE.NAME: language

TIMEOUT.NAME: timeout

DURATION.DESCRIPTION: How long the timeout will last, up to 28 days (Default: 1 hour or disable)
DURATION.NAME: duration

TIMEOUT.TIME_AUTOCOMPLETE: {condition, select, greater{(Greater than {time}) {input}} less{(Less than {time}) {input}} other{{default, select, set{{time}} unset{Remove timeout} other{{time} or remove timeout}}}}

USER.DESCRIPTION: The user to get information about
USER.NAME: user
